name: Butterfly Tea
description:
Q&A (HINT) SESSION WHEN WE REACH 100 DOWNLOADS!

Help Moira host a tea party in this cute non-linear adventure with visual novel elements and point-and-click puzzles! 

Navigate a colourful magical world, find yummy food ingredients, and chat with your fluffy guests... but don't stray too far away!

Your actions will decide how your party ends. Be good and you'll have nothing to worry about! Nothing at all <3

This game is currently a demo, a modified segment of the full game. The demo may differ from the full version, so the same puzzles might not be solved the same way.

The full version is planned to release around summer 2021. 

GAMEPLAY TIME (updated)

The average gameplay time for the demo is about 1 hour but may be longer if you try to get all 5 demo endings. The record is 30 minutes though.

The planned gameplay time for the full version is a few hours.

FEATURING

  • Point-and-click puzzles in a surreal world... Nothing is what it seems!
  • Talking animal dolls with quests unlock-able based on your interactions, so choose your words wisely!
  • Various mini-games (1 for the demo)
  • An escape-room game Don't stray too far away from the party!
  • Multiple endings:
    • 5 demo endings, but many more in the full version, which may or may not be the same
    • Some are unlocked as you get specific endings.
    • The extras section will be available in the full version as it contains spoilers.

WARNING: This game contains horror themes and other sensitive content but does not contain any jump-scare, sexual content, or graphic depiction of gore (except for blood).  If you are a child, please seek permission from your guardian. Feel free to leave a comment if you have any question.

This is currently a donate-what-you-want game, which means that you can get it for FREE! Though any donation would be a great help in funding later versions of this game.

Feel free to share your thoughts and report any bugs in the comment section.  If you ever film your gameplay, please share the link! I would love to take a look. I appreciate your time.

Thanks for giving this a try!

Button Cupcake

P.S. Stuck? Take a look at the Development log below for hints !
